author: Rejnka

text: C418 is one of my favorite game musicians of all time. If it wasn't for him I wouldn't play Minecraft. He's mastered that rare craft where, within seconds, he can pull me into a land of mystery. The music almost makes me feel like a child, intertwining feelings of innocence, comfort, fear and the unease of the great unknown.
author: CinnamonThief

text: CinnamonThief beautifully worded, couldn't agree more
author: Jan

text: C418 is one of the most underrated IDM/electronic producers ever. Truly heartbreaking how little he's been recognized outside of the Minecraft community.

author: SupraDarky

text: C418's role in the rise of minecraft is hugely underestimated! One of the first things that captivated me about the game was the music. It always gives you this sense of exploration. And when I would take a break from the game, I sometimes came back to it just to experience that calmness and peace the music and atmosphere delivered me!
author: Jan

text: Back in my day minecraft didnt have music
author: Beau -

text: C418 finally returns with new music for Minecraft with this latest update. Only 3 tracks, but all very solid ambient pieces. I especially love the buildup to 3:25 in this one and how it ends with a fading relaxing tune. C418 is a great talent and creates atmospheric themes like few can. I would love for him to work on a big open world RPG and see what he could do (akin to Jeremy Soule and the Elder Scrolls series).
author: SupraDarky

text: I really like that you admire the music that C418 makes. I'm a fan since I first played Minecraft in 2011 and I always found it really sad, when people say that it's OST is boring or bad. I really love his music and I think MC has one of the best fitting soundtracks in any game.
author: My Gaming Diary

text: I'd love to see him tackle other games just to see what he could do. It's so hard to imagine his music anywhere else than minecraft.
author: CinnamonThief
